name: bluesparrow-labs-portfolio
description: BlueSparrow Labs portfolio website (static HTML/CSS/JS) optimized for GitHub Pages.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/assets/css dist/assets/js dist/assets/images dist/assets/fonts
scripts.minify:html: npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html index.html && npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments -o dist/404.html 404.html
scripts.copy: cp -r assets/images dist/assets/ && cp -r assets/fonts dist/assets/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html && npm run copy && npm run copy:static
